topics.body:
"@Too_Offensive":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54cf1a69636872510d241000#post_54cf1a69636872510d241000
Akibaranger is basically about a Delusional Sentai fanboy, A Martial artist, And A cosplay Otaku girl fighting "Blatantly Evil Guerilla Marketing Firm B" (Who wish to turn Akibahara into a business district devoid of Otaku culture) with an encyclopedia of sentai tropes and a lot of enthusiasm to get recognized as an official sentai. (I'm sure that It's good, Just make sure to go with Over-time's subs.)
